prefill_custom_text: fondo limpio, colores neutros, props mínimos, estética premium simple. texturas naturales, sombras coherentes, cero look IA, sin artefactos.

auto_product_desc.title_short: Baby Striped T-shirt with Gold Messi 10 Print
auto_product_desc.product_description_long: A baby short-sleeved t-shirt featuring a classic design of alternating vertical light blue and white stripes. It has a round neckline with a thin brown trim and two snap buttons on the left shoulder for easy dressing. The front proudly displays a gold stylized 'M' logo, the word 'MESSI', and the number '10' in a prominent gold print.
key_visual_features: vertical light blue and white stripes
prompt_boosters: Ensure gold print details (logo, 'MESSI', '10') are accurate in color and placement.
Preserve round neck shape and thin brown trim.
Show two snap buttons on the shoulder clearly.
Render fabric texture as soft and smooth.
